dataTemplate.name: NVO_DOMESTIC_PROFIT_LOSS_LOAD_CR
dataTemplate.description: NVO Domestic Profit Loss By Load Created Date

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :INS_START_DATE lc_start_date, :INS_END_DATE lc_end_date, REPLACE(:INV_PARTY_ID,'SCOULAR.','') bill_to_cust, :LOC loc_string FROM DUAL

SELECT d.load_number, d.billto_name, LISTAGG(d.origin_id,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY d.origin_id) origin_id, LISTAGG(d.dest_id,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY d.dest_id) dest_id, LISTAGG(d.origin_city,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY d.origin_city) origin_city, LISTAGG(d.origin_state,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY d.origin_state) origin_state, LISTAGG(d.dest_city,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY d.dest_city) dest_city, LISTAGG(d.dest_state,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY d.dest_state) dest_state, d.ins_date, d.carrier, d.revenue, d.expense, d.profit, d.loc_num, d.manager_name FROM (SELECT c.load_number, c.billto_name, c.origin_id, c.dest_id, c.origin_city, c.origin_state, c.dest_city, c.dest_state, c.ins_date, c.carrier, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(c.revenue),2),'999,999,990.00')) revenue, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(c.expense),2),'999,999,990.00')) expense, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND((SUM(c.revenue) - SUM(c.expense)),2),'999,999,990.00')) profit, c.loc_num, c.manager_name FROM (SELECT b.*, (CASE WHEN b.perspective = 'S' THEN (SELECT SUM(sca.cost) FROM shipment_cost sca WHERE sca.shipment_gid = b.shipment_gid AND b.perspective = 'S') ELSE 0 END) revenue, (CASE WHEN b.perspective = 'B' THEN (SELECT SUM(scb.cost) FROM shipment_cost scb WHERE scb.shipment_gid = b.shipment_gid AND b.perspective = 'B') ELSE 0 END) expense FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT j.job_gid, ship.shipment_gid, ship.shipment_type_gid, ship.transport_mode_gid, ship.is_primary, ship.perspective, j.job_xid load_number, loc1.location_xid billto_name, loc2.location_xid origin_id, loc3.location_xid dest_id, loc2.city origin_city, loc2.province_code origin_state, loc3.city dest_city, loc3.province_code dest_state, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') ins_date, loc4.location_xid carrier, j.attribute4 loc_num, con1.contact_xid manager_name FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul1 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj1 ON sessuj1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej1 ON sessuj1.s_equipment_gid = ssej1.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s1 ON ssej1.shipment_gid = s1.shipment_gid AND s1.is_primary='Y' AND s1.perspective='B' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul2 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul2.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj2 ON sessuj2.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul2.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej2 ON sessuj2.s_equipment_gid = ssej2.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s2 ON ssej2.shipment_gid = s2.shipment_gid AND s2.is_primary='Y' AND s2.perspective='S' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s1.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej3 ON s1.shipment_gid = ssej3.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj3 ON ssej3.s_equipment_gid = sessuj3.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul3 ON ssul3.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj3.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN order_release orel1 ON ssul3.order_release_gid = orel1.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON orel1.source_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON orel1.dest_location_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc4 ON s1.servprov_gid = loc4.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s1.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul4 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul4.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj4 ON sessuj4.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul4.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej4 ON sessuj4.s_equipment_gid = ssej4.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON ssej4.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND (TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:INS_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:INS_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND j.attribute4 IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt) UNION SELECT DISTINCT j.job_gid, ship.shipment_gid, ship.shipment_type_gid, ship.transport_mode_gid, ship.is_primary, ship.perspective, j.job_xid load_number, loc1.location_xid billto_name, loc2.location_xid origin_id, loc3.location_xid dest_id, loc2.city origin_city, loc2.province_code origin_state, loc3.city dest_city, loc3.province_code dest_state, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') ins_date, loc4.location_xid carrier, j.attribute4 loc_num, con1.contact_xid manager_name FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul1 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj1 ON sessuj1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej1 ON sessuj1.s_equipment_gid = ssej1.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s1 ON ssej1.shipment_gid = s1.shipment_gid AND s1.is_primary='Y' AND s1.perspective='B' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul2 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul2.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj2 ON sessuj2.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul2.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej2 ON sessuj2.s_equipment_gid = ssej2.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s2 ON ssej2.shipment_gid = s2.shipment_gid AND s2.is_primary='Y' AND s2.perspective='S' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s1.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej3 ON s1.shipment_gid = ssej3.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj3 ON ssej3.s_equipment_gid = sessuj3.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul3 ON ssul3.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj3.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN order_release orel1 ON ssul3.order_release_gid = orel1.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON orel1.source_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON orel1.dest_location_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc4 ON s1.servprov_gid = loc4.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s1.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON s1.shipment_gid = ship.original_shipment_gid OR s2.shipment_gid = ship.original_shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'SECONDARY CHARGE' WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND (TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:INS_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:INS_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND j.attribute4 IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt)) a LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj3 ON a.job_gid = jorj3.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssula ON jorj3.order_release_gid = ssula.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuja ON sessuja.s_ship_unit_gid = ssula.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join sseja ON sessuja.s_equipment_gid = sseja.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s3 ON sseja.shipment_gid = s3.shipment_gid AND s3.shipment_type_gid ='TRANSPORT' AND s3.is_primary='Y' AND s3.perspective='S' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s3.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' WHERE ((:INV_PARTY_ID IS NULL) OR (NOT :INV_PARTY_ID IS NULL AND sip.involved_party_contact_gid = :INV_PARTY_ID)) AND NOT s3.shipment_gid IS NULL) b) c GROUP BY c.load_number, c.billto_name, c.origin_id, c.dest_id, c.origin_city, c.origin_state, c.dest_city, c.dest_state, c.ins_date, c.carrier, c.loc_num, c.manager_name ORDER BY c.load_number) d GROUP BY d.load_number, d.billto_name, d.ins_date, d.carrier, d.revenue, d.expense, d.profit, d.loc_num, d.manager_name

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.job_gid) file_count, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(c.revenue),'999,999,990.00')) tot_revenue, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(c.expense),'999,999,990.00')) tot_expense, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SUM(c.revenue) - SUM(c.expense)),'999,999,990.00')) tot_profit FROM (SELECT b.job_gid, (CASE WHEN b.perspective = 'S' THEN (SELECT SUM(sca.cost) FROM shipment_cost sca WHERE sca.shipment_gid = b.shipment_gid AND b.perspective = 'S') ELSE 0 END) revenue, (CASE WHEN b.perspective = 'B' THEN (SELECT SUM(scb.cost) FROM shipment_cost scb WHERE scb.shipment_gid = b.shipment_gid AND b.perspective = 'B') ELSE 0 END) expense FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT j.job_gid, ship.shipment_gid, ship.perspective FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul1 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj1 ON sessuj1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej1 ON sessuj1.s_equipment_gid = ssej1.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s1 ON ssej1.shipment_gid = s1.shipment_gid AND s1.is_primary='Y' AND s1.perspective='B' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul2 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul2.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj2 ON sessuj2.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul2.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej2 ON sessuj2.s_equipment_gid = ssej2.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s2 ON ssej2.shipment_gid = s2.shipment_gid AND s2.is_primary='Y' AND s2.perspective='S' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul3 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul3.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj3 ON sessuj3.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul3.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej3 ON sessuj3.s_equipment_gid = ssej3.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON ssej3.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND (TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:INS_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:INS_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND j.attribute4 IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt) UNION SELECT DISTINCT j.job_gid, ship.shipment_gid, ship.perspective FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul1 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj1 ON sessuj1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej1 ON sessuj1.s_equipment_gid = ssej1.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s1 ON ssej1.shipment_gid = s1.shipment_gid AND s1.is_primary='Y' AND s1.perspective='B' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul2 ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul2.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj2 ON sessuj2.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul2.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej2 ON sessuj2.s_equipment_gid = ssej2.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s2 ON ssej2.shipment_gid = s2.shipment_gid AND s2.is_primary='Y' AND s2.perspective='S' INNER JOIN shipment ship ON s1.shipment_gid = ship.original_shipment_gid OR s2.shipment_gid = ship.original_shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'SECONDARY CHARGE' WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND (TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:INS_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:INS_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND j.attribute4 IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt)) a LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj3 ON a.job_gid = jorj3.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssula ON jorj3.order_release_gid = ssula.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuja ON sessuja.s_ship_unit_gid = ssula.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join sseja ON sessuja.s_equipment_gid = sseja.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s3 ON sseja.shipment_gid = s3.shipment_gid AND s3.shipment_type_gid ='TRANSPORT' AND s3.is_primary='Y' AND s3.perspective='S' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s3.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' WHERE ((:INV_PARTY_ID IS NULL) OR (NOT :INV_PARTY_ID IS NULL AND sip.involved_party_contact_gid = :INV_PARTY_ID)) AND NOT s3.shipment_gid IS NULL) b) c
